name: Confidentiality of records
text:
§560:5-407  Confidentiality of records.  The written report of a kokua kanawai and any professional evaluation are confidential and shall be sealed upon filing, but shall be available to:
     (1)  The court;
     (2)  The respondent without limitation as to use;
     (3)  The petitioner, the kokua kanawai, any nominated conservator, and the petitioner's, nominated conservator's, and respondent's lawyers, for purposes of the proceeding; and
     (4)  Other persons for any purposes that the court may order for good cause. [L 2004, c 161, pt of §1; am L 2008, c 39, §7]
 
Rules of Court
 
  Confidentiality of records, see HPR rule 113.1.
